devdoc.author: David Anderson

addBoardMem(address,string,string).details: This creates an entry for the mapping that determines who has access to certain functions and creates a publicly viewable record of the members of the board.

devdoc.title: Contract for a Board Entity for an transparent real world organization

kill().notice: This function allows for the destruction of the contract
